General.Name: Wutong Holding Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Wutong Holding Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of wireless communication RF connection systems and fiber connection products. The company provides communication connection products for RF and fiber connection fields, as well as mobile communication terminal devices. It offers wireless communication RF connection system products, which primarily include RF coaxial connectors, adaptors, surge arrestors, cables and cable assemblies, and interconnect devices, such as terminal loads, as well as related connection structure parts. The company also provides optic-electric products, including optical splitters, optical fiber patch cords, optical cables, optical fiber connectors, and boxes. In addition, it offers communication antennas. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Wutong Communications Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Wutong Holding Group Co., Ltd. in October 2015. Wutong Holding Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Suzhou, China.
General.Address: Xiangcheng Economic Development Zone, Suzhou, China, 215143
